94093.「ここから 北東へ街道沿いに進むと\n 木かげの集落という 集落に出ます。\n<:
From here, you will reach the village of Treeshade Village by following the road to the northeast. If you continue
along the road from there, you will reach Tsusukul Village, where Elf live. If you have never been to
Tsusukul Village, I recommend you to go there.

94094.「ごきげんよう。旅のお方。\n 私は 行商人のルバンと申します。\n 以後 お見:
Cheery. Hello, traveler. My name is Ruban, a peddler. I hope to make your acquaintance. My job is to transport
goods from Wind Town Azlan to various places in this wagon. We are going to Mountain Pass via Tsusukul Village. If
you wish, I can give you a ride.

94095.「これから ツスクルの村を経由して\n 山間の関所まで 行くのですが\n<br>:
We are going to Mountain Pass via
Tsusukul Village. If you like, I can
give you a ride.<bw_break>

pick you up. If that is still the
case, where would you like to ride to?

39139.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「おや <pc>:

39140.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「おお <pc>:

36190.「うーん むにゃ むにゃ……\n 寝かせといてくれよ。:

48834.テントの中で 誰かが寝ている気配がする。\n今は 入らないほうが よさそうだ。:

36193.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「痛い…… 痛いよ。:
It hurts. It hurts. My back hurts so much, but I can't move my udder to rub it. Come on, rub me, priest. My
husband left me because he didn't want me to catch the disease.

36194.<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>「おや <pc>:
Oh . I recall that this was your first assignment here. But I don't need your help. I, Zahokku, will
take care of everything.

36195.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「なんと！ 閃香:
Oh, my God! You mean to tell me that an aromatic tree called the Sparkling Tree is effective against the deadly
Spelly Breath? Hm, then, if we go to the Morinara branch of the Ranger Association in the northwest forest,
we may be able to ask them about the fragrant tree.

36196.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「さあ あなたは:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>Now you go back to your training. I,
Zahokku, will find the fragrant tree
and show it to you.

36197.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「はあはあ…… み:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>I can't see anything. I can't see
anything. I wonder if I'm going to die
like this.

36198.<if_woman><attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>:
Uggghhh, my sister, laugh at me, your brother who can do nothing. I've tried everything, spells, medicines, new

36200.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「ありがとね 僧:
Thank you priest. If it wasn't for you, I'd be wasted for sure. You saved my life. I'll do my best to survive. I

36201.<if_woman><attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_att:

60374.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「旅人はん ご存:
Travelers, do you know about this? There is a salon in Royal City Kamiharmui, far to the west. I've been
asked to work there as an apprentice hairdresser. I'm on my way to Royal City now.

60375.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「うちは サロン:
I am an apprentice hairdresser at Salon Fee Lycia. I've decided to create a new color for the salon.
Since I've gone to all this trouble, I thought I'd make a color that would please my customers, a color that
would bring them a sense of dusty hospitality, so I came here to pick something called Tea Plant Leaves.

60376.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「せやけど 今が摘み:
But it must have been a disaster that it was the best time to pick them, because <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>, who lives
along the river in the southeast, took away my Tea Plant Leaves. I'm sorry, traveler. <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> is a very
strong monster around here, could you please go and get the Tea Plant Leaves back?

60377.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「まあ……！ ほ:
Oh, well! Are you sure?I was so relieved I had a bit of a bittersweet tear. Thank you, traveler. I'm
counting on you.

60378.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「まあ……！ ほ:
Oh, well! Are you sure? But, traveler. Don't you have many other requests? I can't ask such a favor from you.
Please call on me again when you are free.

60379.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「そうどすか。ほんな:
Is that so? If that's so, I can't help it. I left my hometown to study the spirit of hospitality, and chose to
become a hair stylist. Dealing with monsters is just too, too much for me. Ah, what should I do?

60380.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「うち 美容院に:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>I wanted to create a dusty, welcoming
color scheme that would please the
guests who come to the salon.<open_irai><bw_break>

60381.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「せやけど それ:
But the Tea Plant Leaves we need were taken away by <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> on the river southeast of Azlan Region. He is
a very strong monster around here. For your sake, traveler. Please defeat him and bring back the Tea Plant Leaves.

60387.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「まあ…… うちの:

60388.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「まあ おおきに:

60389.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「さっそく つこ:

60390.<se_nots joutyu SUCCESS>「まずは チャノキの葉を よぉ熱:
First, the Tea Plant Leaves are heated well and allowed to dry slowly. Then I break them into small pieces. Hmmm...
A nice, soft aroma. It reminds me of my mother who lives far away from me. Then, add hot water a little at a time
and mix carefully with all your heart. Finish with a touch of magic and it's ready to serve.

60391.「ほな マジカル マジカル♪\n ワビーノ サビーノ！\n チャノユノ ココーロ:

60392.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「まあ 見ておく:
